duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in design discussions, execute development against design, and navigate the complex codebase.
Support and maintain applications utilizing required tools and technologies.
Provide support for applications including involvement with the Support Centre, Networking and Infrastructure teams, and vendors as appropriate.
Experience with Java Frameworks Professional work experience with API design, automation, & security.
Experience working with frontend languages/libraries (HTML, JavaScript, CSS3, etc.).
Excellent verbal and written communication and collaboration skills.
